QuestData.Title: Old Stonetusk
QuestData.Description:
I have a grim task for you, $p. Not every kill is a measure of skill. Some are measures of kindness.
There's an old bull mammoth wandering the forest east of Camp Antonidas. I saw him from a distance awhile back, and I hear his sad trumpeting every so often. Clearly he's in great pain.
He's started crashing blindly through the undergrowth, and I'm worried he's becoming a danger to others.
It'd make my old heart glad if you put a fellow weary soul to rest. Bring me his tusk so we can honor him.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: An ancient bull mammoth who has become a danger to himself and others.
QuestData.LogDescription: Put Old Stonetusk down near Camp Antonidas.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Hemet Nesingwary Jr. in Camp Nowhere.
QuestData.RewardText:
This brings me no joy.
But I'll hang his tusk in a place of honor.
Thank you, $n.
